name: @smartup/pipeline-ui
description: Reusable React components for AI Pipeline timeline and history visualization

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --format esm --dts --clean --external react --external react-dom && npm run build:styles
scripts.build:styles: mkdir -p dist/styles && cat dist/variables-*.css dist/Button-*.css dist/Badge-*.css dist/Modal-*.css dist/TimelineEvent-*.css dist/HistoryView-*.css dist/StartPipelineModal-*.css > dist/styles/index.css && cp dist/variables-*.css dist/styles/variables.css
